name: Hidden Object - Icarus
description:
Would you like to have wings and take flight?! Experience the modern day world of Icarus, as you soar through eye-catching cityscapes or enjoy a rest in natural environments. Remember, do not fly too close to the sun!

Icarus features high quality HD graphics and the ability to zoom and pan the images.

Find the hidden objects within 8 beautiful scenes, with three difficulties and four game modes to try!

Features:
-Beautiful HD images
-Pinch to zoom and pan
-8 different locations to explore
-3 Difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenge
-4 Game modes: Picture, Silhouette, Words, Random
-Training mode and hints available
-New Art Gallery
